trans-unit.source: Provides caching services to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> object in order to improve performance.
Applications that use this caching mechanism are responsible for invalidating the content in the cache when it has changed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache"></xref> class.
Notifies the text engine client of a change to the cache when text content or text run properties of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> are added, removed, or replaced.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> character index position of the start of the change.
Indicates the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> characters to be added.
Indicates the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> characters to be removed.
Signals the text engine client to invalidate the entire contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> cache.
Invalidating the entire cache has the effect of emptying the cache.
The cache refills with subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting> APIs.
